# ScoreHandler

# ScoreHandler

Static class that can convert scores to objects and strings and back.

Kind: global class

  • ScoreHandler
    • .measureToObject(measure) ⇒ Object
    • .notesToObject(notesMember) ⇒ Object
    • .objectToMeasure(measureObject) ⇒ Measure
    • .scoreToObject(score) ⇒ Object
    • .objectToScore(scoreObject) ⇒ Score
    • .stringifyScore(score) ⇒ string
    • .parseScore(stringifiedScore) ⇒ Score

# ScoreHandler.measureToObject(measure) ⇒ Object

Convert a measure to object literal.

Kind: static method of ScoreHandler

Param Type
measure Measure

# ScoreHandler.notesToObject(notesMember) ⇒ Object

Convert a measure's notes member to object literal.

Kind: static method of ScoreHandler

Param
notesMember

# ScoreHandler.objectToMeasure(measureObject) ⇒ Measure

Convert object literal representing a measure to an instance of Measure.

Kind: static method of ScoreHandler

Param Type
measureObject object

# ScoreHandler.scoreToObject(score) ⇒ Object

Convert a measure to object literal.

Kind: static method of ScoreHandler

Param Type
score Score

# ScoreHandler.objectToScore(scoreObject) ⇒ Score

Convert object literal representing a Score to an instance of Score.

Kind: static method of ScoreHandler

Param Type
scoreObject object

# ScoreHandler.stringifyScore(score) ⇒ string

Convert a score to string.

Kind: static method of ScoreHandler

Param Type
score Score

# ScoreHandler.parseScore(stringifiedScore) ⇒ Score

Convert a stringified score back to a score.

Kind: static method of ScoreHandler

Param Type
stringifiedScore string
